column2: It's not just that it's made of\nsilver, either... There's something\nelse to it. A great power...
column3: 这不只是单纯的由银打造……\n显然，还隐藏着某种力量……

column2: In all the years I've been running\nthis shop, I've never seen such a\nspectacular sword.
column3: 我经营武器店这么多年，\n还是第一次看到这么惊人的剑……！

column2: You should take good care of that\nblade, Adol. It will prove to be a\ngreat asset to you, I suspect.
column3: 你一定要妥善保管这把剑。\n关键时刻它一定会派上用场的。

column2: The short sword is small, but\nit's light and easy to handle.\nAn excellent choice for daily use.
column3: 短剑体积不大，轻巧好用。\n在日常生活中也用得到它。

column2: You already have that exact item.\n...Why would you want another?
column3: 什么，你不是已经有了吗。\n同样的剑不需要那么多吧？

column2: Sorry, but you don't have enough\nmoney for this. Feel free to come\nback when you do, however!
column3: 你的钱不够哦。\n我帮你保留着，下次再来吧。

column2: The long sword is well-suited to\ncombat, befitting a true swordsman.\nIts workmanship is top-class.
column3: 这是把适合剑士实战用的长剑。\n优点是钢铁打造，分量十足。

column2: Regrettably, the Talwar is from\nthe far east, and the Stormwall's\nmade restocking most difficult.
column3: 不好意思，塔瓦弯刀是东方国家的剑，\n岚之结界害得商船无法开进来，\n现在很难弄到手了。

column2: My shipment washed ashore, I hear,\nbut it's still being catalogued, so\nthere may be delays. My apologies!
column3: 到货后我会帮你保留一把的，\n请你再等一下吧。

column2: The Talwar is a curved sword from\nthe far east. It handles uniquely,\nbut is a truly superior blade.
column3: 塔瓦弯刀是东方传来的弯刀。\n与普通的剑不同，很难使用，\n但是，保证绝对锋利。

column2: Offense is a great luxury, but\ndefense is an absolute necessity. As\nsuch, proper armor is vital.
column3: 比起武器，更应该优先考虑防具，\n这样会有更高的概率存活下来哦。

column2: They say the best defense is a good\noffense, but if the situation gets\nugly, offense won't matter one whit.
column3: 俗话说『攻击是最好的防御』，\n但是被魔物包围的话，就束手无策了吧？

column2: Hmm...I believe that with the silver\nshield, you'd be afforded some\nmeasure of divine protection.
column3: 嗯……那面银盾\n好像有得到神圣的庇护之力。

column2: That's what the ancient writing\ncarved upon it seems to indicate.
column3: 表面刻着的古代文字\n应该是祝福之语吧。

column2: It's made of hammered silver, yet\nremains strong as can be.
column3: 看来似乎是用银打造的，\n不过，它的强度丝毫不受影响。

column2: And a blessing is carved amongst\nthe other decorations.
column3: 祝福之语巧妙地刻在\n装饰的浮雕之间。

column2: The workmanship on this piece...\nis astounding!
column3: 这是多么鬼斧神工的技艺啊……！

column2: It's made of knitted chain. Easy to\nmove around in, and well ventilated\nso as not to slow-cook its wearer.
column3: 锁子甲是用铁链编织而成的铠甲。\n轻巧便于活动，\n而且穿起来透气，不会感到闷热。

column2: The one you bought earlier should\nstill suffice. My wares do not wear\ndown so easily!
column3: 对了，这个之前你买过了。\n我们卖的商品都很坚固的，\n照理来说应该还能继续用的。

column2: You don't have enough. Perhaps you\nshould look at our less expensive\nwares. I believe they would suffice.
column3: 好像超出你的预算了。\n建议你不要勉强购买，\n先买便宜的装备吧。

column2: The plate mail is made of numerous\ninterlocking metal plates. Heavy,\nbut it offers unparalleled defense.
column3: 这个金属板甲是\n用钢板层叠组合起来的铠甲。\n虽然很笨重，但是防御力超群。

column2: The reflex armor is the crowning\njewel of my inventory. It's a light\nleather armor treated with resin.
column3: 反射护甲是我们引以为傲的商品。\n是表面经过特殊树脂加工处理的皮甲。\n重量很轻，但是比钢铁更坚硬。

column2: The small shield is made of\nreinforced wood. It's light\nand easy to use.
column3: 小盾是以坚硬的木材，\n用铆钉加固制成的盾牌。\n重量轻，很容易使用哦。

column2: The middle shield is made with\nleather wired into the frame. It's\nlight, and protects splendidly.
column3: 中盾是以皮革为材料，\n嵌入铁丝加工制成的盾牌。\n不仅重量轻，强度也不可小觑。

column2: The large shield is made of steel.\nIt's durable, and can stand up to\nany attack thrown at you.
column3: 大盾啊。\n是用铁板加工制成的盾牌，所以很重。\n不过能够抵挡住任何魔物的第一下攻击哦。
#026000>4Gold#00>4是不便宜啦，\n但是保证你绝不会吃亏的。

column2: Hello. How may I help you?
It's been quite busy in here ever\nsince the monsters started showing\nup. People are always getting hurt.
column3: 自从魔物出现以后，\n受伤的人不断增加，忙死了。

column2: Dr. Klaus went to make a house call\nat Zepik Village, since they have\nno medical facility or staff there.
column3: 克劳斯医生甚至还跑到\n没有医生的塞皮克村去出诊呢。

column2: Dr. Klaus is so busy, I rarely see\nhim around the clinic these days.
column3: 克劳斯医生太忙了，\n待在医院的时间反而比较少。

column2: Though Klaus and Bludo are the\nonly doctors in all of Esteria, so\nreally, I shouldn't be surprised.
column3: 艾斯塔里亚除了巴尔巴多的布卢多医生\n和克劳斯医生以外，没有别的医生了，\n所以这也是没有办法的事啊……

column2: I...was down at Sara's house\nnot long ago.
column3: 以前我……\n经常会到莎拉小姐的店里去玩。

column2: She was positively giddy, claiming\nto have found the man she'd been\nsearching for, after all this time.
column3: 我还记得之前她告诉我，\n『我终于找到一直在找的那个人了』，\n那时候她看起来可开心了……

column2: Do you have medicine with you? You\nshould always keep some handy, as\nyou never know when you'll need it.
column3: 你有带药吗？\n为了以防万一，\n建议你还是随时携带些。

column2: Dr. Klaus is out, as usual. But I'm\na trained professional, myself.\nI'll be happy to help.
column3: 克劳斯医生还是一样那么忙。\n为了可以帮医生多分摊一些，\n我得好好加油才行……

column2: What's this? You're not injured at\nall! What's your angle, swordsman?\nDo my hands feel THAT GOOD on you?
The doctor is on a house call, but\nI can treat you in his place, if\nyou'll let me.
column3: 医生现在出诊去了。\n不介意的话，我可以为你治疗哦。
#02需要50>4Gold#00>4，\n这个费用你愿意负担吗？

column2: Now, please hold still while I...\nwork my magic...
column3: 不要动，\n请保持这样不要动哦……

column2: There, that should do it. Please\ndo be a bit more careful in the\nfuture, though, okay?
column3: 好，这样就可以了。\n以后请不要再这么乱来了。
